title: Fabric Boosted 1.21.11 Released!
summary: We are excited to announce the release of Fabric Boosted 2.7.0-Alpha1 which supports 1.21.11

content.paragraph: We are excited to announce the release of [Fabric Boosted 2.7.0-Alpha1](https://modrinth.com/modpack/fabric-boosted/version/2.7.0-Alpha1) which supports Minecraft 1.21.11

Note that this is an Alpha release, meaning some mods may be missing or unstable.
We recommend backing up your worlds before updating. You can update via Modrinth App by selecting the Fabric Boosted instance and clicking 'Update pack'.

title: 30k Downloads Milestone!
summary: We are excited to announce that Fabric Boosted has reached 30,000 downloads on Modrinth!

content.paragraph: We are thrilled to announce that Fabric Boosted has reached a milestone of 30,000 downloads on Modrinth! This achievement reflects the incredible support and enthusiasm from our community. We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to each and every one of you for being part of this journey.
We are excited to continue improving Fabric Boosted and bringing you more updates in the future. Stay tuned for more exciting content!
